title: Imagine being fired because you are the wrong gender and replaced with people of the correct gender
body:
The worst part of this whole mess over in LCL is that the 5 guys on that team were all suddenly fired so that they could be replaced with all females. 

That's disgusting. The more I dig into this, the more crap I find that's just not okay.

Imagine being fired because the stuff between your legs isn't correct. Holy shit what a PR disaster for Riot.
